name: FreelancePro.Me
overview:
A start-up that is geared at enabling freelancers get more jobs. FreelancePro.Me creates a beautiful professional profile for freelancers, by connecting with their multiple job sites. This profile enables freelancers to better promote themselves to prospective clients, in order to get more jobs.

FreelancePro.Me also aggregates jobs that meet the skill sets and are relevant to freelancers, across their multiple job sites. This saves them time from going through the multiple job sites to bid for jobs.
